headline: PARTIES IN RUSSIA GETTING TOGETHER; Government, Council, and Duma Agree on Basic Program, Including War's Continuance. MILUKOFF QUITS CABINET Sazonoff, Recalled as He Starts for London Embassy, May Join Coalition Ministry. Cardinal Points Agreed Upon. Socialists Distrusted Milukoff. PARTIES IN RUSSIA GETTING TOGETHER

headline: AMERICAN DESTROYERS IN WAR ZONE; JOINED BRITISH NAVAL PATROL MAY 4; ONE VESSEL HAS FOUGHT A SUBMARINE; FLOTILLA WARMLY GREETED Reaches Queenstown and the Same Day Goes Out on Duty. ADMIRAL SIMS IN COMMAND English Officer Calls the Tars "a Fine Body of Men" and Praises the Craft. RESULT OF FIGHT NOT TOLD Beatty and Mayo Exchange Congratulations;-More Destroyers to be Sent. "We Can Start at Once." Escorted Atlantic Liner. Rear Admiral Sims in Command. A Surprise to English People. ACTIVE ABROAD SINCE MAY 4 Daniels Says Destroyers Left American Ports in April.
tweet: American Destroyers in War Zone; Joined British Naval Patrol May 4; One Vessel Has Fought a Submarine; Flotilla Warmly Greeted... #1917LIVE

headline: SEE ACT OF DISCIPLINE IN RITTER'S TRANSFER; Berne and Washington Recall His Efforts to Mediate Between America and Germany.

headline: GENERAL STAFF OPPOSES PETAIN; Believes Rushing of a Small Force to France Would Sacrifice Men Needlessly. WOULD HINDER PLANS HERE A Similar French Proposal to the War Department Admitted Need of Men. MUST FIGHT UNDER OUR FLAG Army Officers Think the Country Would Not Tolerate Any Other Arrangement. Proposal Made Formally. Proposal Emphatically Opposed.
tweet: General Staff Opposes Petain; Believes Rushing of a Small Force to France Would Sacrifice Men Needlessly. Would Hinder Plans... #1917LIVE

headline: WON'T NEGOTIATE, REPLY TO HOLLWEG; Cecil and Asquith Say No Guarantee Against Annexations Now. SYMPATHIZE WITH RUSSIA But German Colonies Cannot Be Restored Nor Liberation of Oppressed Peoples Abandoned. WON'T NEGOTIATE, REPLY TO HOLLWEG BETHMAN FAILED TO PLEASE. Discontent General, but Annexationists Still Have Hopes. AGAIN THREATENS A REPUBLIC Ledebour Says Partition of Alsace-Lorraine Would Be Signal for It.
